statements: SELECT * FROM medical_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_inventory;
SELECT item_name, storage_location FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM medical_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Room A';
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, storage_location FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE storage_location LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, storage_location FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY storage_location, item_name DESC;
SELECT id, quantity FROM medical_inventory WHERE item_name IN ('Bandages', 'Medicine') ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 OR storage_location = 'Room A' ORDER BY storage_location ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Supplies WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT name, quantity FROM Medical_Supplies ORDER BY name
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS highest_quantity FROM Medical_Supplies
SELECT id, name FROM Medical_Equipment ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC
SELECT name, location FROM Medical_Supplies WHERE location = 'Storage Room'
SELECT * FROM Medical_Supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, location FROM Medical_Supplies WHERE location = 'Hospital A'
SELECT name, quantity FROM Medical_Supplies WHERE location = 'Clinic X' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM Medical_Equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company' AND acquisition_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, name, acquisition_date FROM Medical_Equipment ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiry_date >= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT equipment_name, status FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT log_id, activity_type, item_id, timestamp FROM inventory_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE supply_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Available' ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT activity_type, timestamp FROM inventory_logs WHERE quantity_changed > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Main Warehouse';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(contact_email) > 10;
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, transaction_date FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM medical_supplies WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE status='Available';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT id, item_name, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT s.item_name, e.equipment_name, i.quantity FROM medical_supplies s INNER JOIN inventory i ON s.id = i.supply_id INNER JOIN equipment e ON e.id = i.equipment_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, s.item_name, e.equipment_name, t.quantity FROM transactions t INNER JOIN medical_supplies s ON s.id = t.supply_id INNER JOIN equipment e ON e.id = t.equipment_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'incoming';
SELECT id, supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
